original: intros lem bool r_antisymmetric. unfold r_antisymmetric. intros m0 m1 H1 H2. destruct m0; destruct m1; try apply I; try apply I. - destruct a0 eqn:Heqa0; destruct a' eqn:Heqa'; simpl in H1; simpl in H2. + apply (leb_antisym b b0); apply H1. + inversion H1. + inversion H1. - destruct a0; destruct b0; destruct a'; destruct b'; simpl in H1; simpl in H2; try discriminate. apply andb_true_iff in H1. destruct H1 as [H1 H1']. apply andb_true_iff in H2. destruct H2 as [H2 H2']. split. + apply H with a a'; auto. + apply H0 with b b'; auto.
